summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YouTube Comment Picker application. Backend APIs working well (8/9 tests passed), frontend fully functional with all core features operational including comment fetching, filtering, winner selection, and export functionality.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 instead of 404 for non-existent video IDs
minor_bugs.impact: Edge case - doesn't affect normal usage

passed_tests: Fetch comments from valid YouTube video (500 comments fetched)
Video information display (title, channel, thumbnail, stats)
Exclude duplicates functionality (reduces eligible count correctly)
No eligible comments handling (returns 400 when no matches)
Winner display with proper formatting and animation
Error toast messages for invalid inputs
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update error handling in /api/youtube/fetch-comments endpoint to return 404 instead of 520 for non-existent videos. This is a low-priority edge case that doesn't affect normal functionality.
